price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ߬ ߛߎ߰ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߦߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߐ߲߮ ߠߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ ߢߐ߲߰ߘߐ ߸ ߤߊߟߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߌߢߍ߫ ߒ ߠߊ߫
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
